8088.description: Management and User web portal HTTP port.
8088.label: Management + User HTTP [e.g. 8088]

27001.description: Omada Controller can be discovered by the Omada app through this port.
27001.label: App discovery [e.g. 27001]

29810.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility discover Omada devices through this port.
29810.label: Device discovery [e.g. 29810]

29811.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility manage Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v4.
29811.label: Device managing (v4) [e.g. 29811]

29812.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility manage/adopt Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v4.
29812.label: Device adoption (v4) [e.g. 29812]

29813.description: When upgrading the firmware for the Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v4.
29813.label: Firmware upgrade (v4) [e.g. 29813]

29814.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility manage Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v5.
29814.label: Device managing (v5) [e.g. 29814]

29815.description: Omada Controller receives Device Info and Packet Capture files from the Omada devices.
29815.label: Device info (v5) [e.g. 29815]

29816.description: Omada Controller establishes the remote control terminal session with the Omada devices.
29816.label: Remote control (v5) [e.g. 29816]

/opt/tplink/EAPController/data.description: Choose a DATA and CONFIG Share for Omada Controller files.
/opt/tplink/EAPController/data.label: Controller DATA + CONFIG Storage [e.g. omada-data]

/opt/tplink/EAPController/logs.description: Choose a LOGS Share for Omada Controller files.
/opt/tplink/EAPController/logs.label: Controller LOGS Storage [e.g. omada-logs]

PUID.description: Enter an existing User ID (UID) to run this Rock-on. They must already have full permissions to Shares used by this Rock-on.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter an existing Group ID (GID) to run this Rock-on. This group (or prior UID) must already have full permissions to Shares used by this Rock-on.
PGID.label: GID

MANAGE_HTTP_PORT.description: Management and User web portal HTTP port.
MANAGE_HTTP_PORT.label: Management HTTP port [e.g. 8088]

PORT_ADOPT_V1.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility manage/adopt Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v4.
PORT_ADOPT_V1.label: Device managing (v4) [e.g. 29812]

PORT_APP_DISCOVERY.description: Omada Controller can be discovered by the Omada app through this port.
PORT_APP_DISCOVERY.label: App discovery [e.g. 27001]

PORT_DISCOVERY.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility discover Omada devices through this port.
PORT_DISCOVERY.label: Device discovery [e.g. 29810]

PORT_MANAGER_V1.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility manage Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v4.
PORT_MANAGER_V1.label: Device managing (v4) [e.g. 29811]

PORT_MANAGER_V2.description: Omada Controller and Omada Discovery Utility manage Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v5.
PORT_MANAGER_V2.label: Device managing (v5) [e.g. 29814]

PORT_UPGRADE_V1.description: When upgrading the firmware for the Omada devices running firmware fully adapted to Omada Controller v4.
PORT_UPGRADE_V1.label: Firmware upgrade (v4) [e.g. 29813]

PORT_TRANSFER_V2.description: Omada Controller receives Device Info and Packet Capture files from the Omada devices.
PORT_TRANSFER_V2.label: Device info (v5) [e.g. 29815]

PORT_RTTY.description: Omada Controller establishes the remote control terminal session with the Omada devices.
PORT_RTTY.label: Remote control (v5) [e.g. 29816]

SHOW_SERVER_LOGS.description: Outputs Omada Controller logs to STDOUT at runtime.
SHOW_SERVER_LOGS.label: Show server logs [e.g. true]

SHOW_MONGODB_LOGS.description: Outputs MongoDB logs to STDOUT at runtime.
SHOW_MONGODB_LOGS.label: Show MongoDB logs [e.g. false]

SSL_CERT_NAME.description: Name of the public certificate chain mounted to /cert.
SSL_CERT_NAME.label: SSL certificate name [e.g. tls.crt]

SSL_KEY_NAME.description: Name of the private certificate mounted to /cert.
SSL_KEY_NAME.label: SSL key name [e.g. tls.key]

TLS_1_11_ENABLED.description: Re-enables TLS 1.0 and 1.1 if set to true.
TLS_1_11_ENABLED.label: Enable unsecure TLS versions [e.g. false]

Omada Controller.description:
TP-Link Omada Controller.

Note: in case of adoption failures, read this!

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/mbentley/omada-controller, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
